titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit against income tax for Social Security taxes paid on up to $25,000 of wages.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 11/14/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual a refundable tax credit (up to $1,550) annually for social security taxes.
